titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, Kiowa, Undated

mods.tableOfContents: 1. M.C. Madison Davis. Guy Heap of Birds and group, Cheyenne songs. 2. M.C. Jesse Davis. Charlie Anquoe, Kiowa songs. 3. Mr. and Mrs. Morris Medicine. Mr. and Mrs. Gilbert Hill. Plus two adults and three children from Fonda, Oklahoma
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
